8186.quoteText: Citizens of EU countries and the United Kingdom must be at least 16 years old to sign up.
8186.title: This service is only available to users of a certain age

8188.quoteText: We don’t use your data for ad targeting, we don’t sell it to others
8188.title: This service does not sell your personal data

tosdr.case: This service does not sell your personal data

8854.quoteText: If collected, this metadata can be kept for 12 months maximum.
8854.title: User logs are deleted after a finite period of time

8856.quoteText:
We don't want to know your real name, gender, age or what you like.

We do not require your screen name to be your real name.
8856.title: The service allows you to use pseudonyms

tosdr.case: The service allows you to use pseudonyms

8857.quoteText: Please study their relevant privacy policies before making your data available to them.

8859.quoteText: Unless stated otherwise in this Privacy Policy, the personal data that you provide us will only be stored for as long as it is necessary for us to fulfill our obligations
